course.title: Course Details
course.bio1: Instructor Ahmed is a coach and consultant in the field of spirituality and mindfulness. He realized early on the importance of helping individuals improve their quality of life and reach deeper levels of inner peace.
course.bio2: He began his journey by exploring the sciences of spirituality and meditation, obtaining specialized diplomas in conscious breathing techniques, mindfulness, and internal energy management. Throughout his career, he has conducted numerous courses and training sessions that have made him an expert in helping people relieve stress and achieve mental and psychological balance between their personal and professional lives.
course.bio3: Ahmed believes that the human spirit needs continuous healing energy and requires a lot of satisfaction and activation of inner self-ability.
